data.description: As reported on, 01 April 2024: The bodies of a female doctor and her surgeon son were found with bullet holes following the withdrawal of Israeli soldiers from a medical facility.
As reported on 01 April 2024: An INGO withdrew all of their services from a medical facility due to increased insecurity in the area.
01 April 2024: A male nurse was killed in a suspected Israeli attack.
As reported, 01 April 2024: An INGO clinic in the vicinity of a medical facility was badly damaged during the 14-day long operation by Israeli forces in and around the medical facility.
02 April 2024: Israeli airstrikes were reported in the vicinity of a medical complex. At least one person was killed and an unspecified number injured.
04 April 2024: Israeli airstrikes were reported in the vicinity of a medical complex, resulting in an unspecified number of injuries.
04 April 2024: Israeli airstrikes were reported in the vicinity of a Red Cross medical facility.
04 April 2024: A paramedic was killed and three injured in an airstrike while trying to evacuate civilian victims of an earlier hit where three Palestinians were killed.
04 April 2024: Ambulance crews were prevented from reaching a man who was shot by Israeli soldiers surrounding his home. The man died from his injuries.

05 April 2024: A supply truck driver who was part of a WHO-led convoy to two medical facilitys was detained for over an hour at a separate location, out of view of the mission team. Eventually the mission was aborted due to safety concerns.

05 April 2024: A WHO-led mission to deliver fuel, medical personnel and supplies to two medical facilitys was aborted due to safety considerations, following delays and the detention of a supply truck driver.

As reported on 06 April 2024: The body of a medical facility's engineering director was discovered with 15 bullets shortly after Israeli forces withdrew from the medical facility after a two week raid.

07 April 2024: A nutritionist, who also worked for a women’s development NGO, was arrested by Israeli forces from her home and sentenced to four months in prison without charge or trial. On 29 July, her sentence was extended for another four months.
Around 07 April 2024: A PRCS ambulance stationed at a PRCS medical facility was reported missing following the withdrawal of Israeli forces from the facility.
08 April 2024: A Red Cross ambulance at a checkpoint was denied access to a child who had been shot by Israeli forces, despite prior coordination, leading to her death.
Around 08 April 2024: A medical facility security guard was killed by Israeli forces.
08 April 2024: A doctor was killed by an Israeli airstrike.
08 April 2024: In Al-Maghazi Refugee Camp, five Palestinians, including the mayor of Al-Maghazi and a nurse, were killed when an Israeli airstrike hit a building.

09 April 2024: A fire of unidentified origin broke out in a warehouse of a medical facility that supplied other medical facilitys in the south. A UN inter-agency assessment reported the warehouse and its supplies were significantly damaged.

As reported on 10 April 2024: Following the withdrawal of Israeli forces from the city, an NGO medical facility was left inoperable due to extensive damage, with no functional equipment, nor oxygen supply, water or electricity.
10 April 2024: A UN warehouse and its medications and supplies was damaged following the withdrawal of Israeli troops.

As reported on 10 April 2024: Following the withdrawal of Israeli forces from the city, a medical facility was left inoperable due to extensive damage, with no functional equipment, nor oxygen supply, water or electricity. The medical facility could not provide maternity services due to the influx of trauma patients.
12 April 2024: A Red Cross ambulance crew in a camp were forced out of the ambulance by Israeli forces who beat the three crew members, and inspected them.

12 April 2024: In a camp, a Red Cross ambulance crew were forced out of the ambulance by Israeli forces. A volunteer was stripped and inspected while other crew members were detained with their hands up.

12 April 2024: In al Far’a refugee camp, Israeli forces opened fire at a PRCS ambulance responding to reports of casualties, damaging it. A paramedic inside the vehicle was beaten and arrested. He was later released and transferred to a medical facility.
12 April 2024: Israeli settlers opened fire on a PRCS ambulance attempting to reach individuals wounded in an attack on the village by Israeli settlers.
12 April 2024: A house inside a camp was hit by Israeli airstrikes, causing damage to a nearby Red Cross ambulance.
13 April 2024: A PRCS ambulance and crew was denied access by Israeli forces for two hours.
13 April 2024: A Red Cross ambulance transporting a casualty was detained and searched, and the driver asked to step outside, by Israeli forces.
13 April 2024: A Red Cross ambulance transporting a casualty was stopped and searched by Israeli forces at the entrance to a village.
13 April 2024: A PRCS ambulance was attacked by Israeli forces who smashed the vehicle’s windows. Israeli forces also attempted to assault the crew

14 April 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped by Israeli forces who forced out the crew, confiscated their phones and keys, and detained a health worker. After three and a half hours. the crew were allowed to go back to the ambulance without reaching their mission. The health worker was released two days later.
14 April 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was struck with rocks from Israeli settlers, breaking its siren.
15 April 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was struck by Israeli forces airstrikes.
17 April 2024: A private nurse was killed by Israeli forces.
18 April 2023: In either Tulkarem or Nur Shams refugee camp, an INGO-trained paramedical volunteer was shot in the leg while on duty during a three-day incursion across the camps.
Between 18-20 April 2024: A health facility in a camp was raided and damaged by Israeli forces.
Around 19 April 2024: Fuel and medical supplies did not reach a medical facility due to checkpoint delays and onoing fighting. A second attempt on 20 April was only partially completed.

19 April 2024: PRCS ambulances were prevented from reaching a camp for several hours by Israeli soldiers during a three-day security operation. One crew was stripped of their bullet proof vests, beaten, and made to lie on the ground amongst victims while their ambulance was searched. At least one elderly man died as a result of delays in reaching the medical facility.

19 April 2024: In Nur Sham Refugee Camp, a PRCS volunteer medic was injured by Israeli sniper fire while working at a first aid point. Colleagues who attempted to reach him were also fired at over the course of 12 hours.
19 April 2024: In Nur Sham Refugee Camp, a Red Cross emergency medical team was detained for about half an hour.
As reported on 19 April 2024: Women's and maternity services at a medical facility were suspended due to high numbers of trauma patients.
20 April 2024: A Red Cross medical crew was denied access to the camp on their way to clear casualties.
20 April 2024: In Bureij Refugee Camp, a doctor and consultant obstetrics and gynaecologist was killed when an Israeli airstrike hit his private clinic.
20 April 2024: A pharmaceutical factory and warehouse was destroyed after being hit by an Israeli airstrike.
20 April 2024: WHO and its partners were unable to assess needs at an NGO medical facility to support restoration of services, increasing the health risks of critical patients being treated there.
20 April 2024: A PRCS ambulance crew was detained and threatened with arrest at the entrance of a medical facility.

20 April 2024: A PRCS paramedic and driver of an ambulance was shot and killed when his ambulance was fired upon while transporting two wounded Palestinians, by Israeli settlers, under the protection of Israeli forces, when they raided the village.
20 April 2024: In Nur Sham Refugee Camp, Israeli forces opened fire at an ambulance as it was trying to enter the camp.

20 April 2024: A planned mission by WHO and its partners to a medical facility was only partially completed due to delays at checkpoints and ongoing fighting. Consequently, fuel and medical supplies did not reach the facility for the second time in a week.
20 April 2024: A PRCS ambulance was prevented by Israeli forces from transporting wounded Palestinians during clashes in the town. After coordination with Red Cross, the crew was granted access.
21 April 2024: Israeli airstrikes were reported in the vicinity of a PRCS medical point.
21 April 2024: Ambulance teams were prevented from reaching a Palestinian woman shot by Israeli soldiers. The woman died from her injuries.
22 April 2024: A clinic sheltering IDPs was hit by Israeli airstrikes, injuring and killing an unspecified number of Palestinians.

22 April 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, the fifth floor and roof of the administration building of an NGO medical facility was hit by Israeli tank artillery, disrupting the facility’s solar energy system and damaging water and fuel tanks. The medical facility offers maternity and survivors of gender-based violence services.
23 April 2023: A medical facility housing displaced people was ordered to evacuate.
24 April 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit with artillery shells.
24 April 2024: A female nursing student was shot and killed by Israeli forces at a checkpoint.
25 April 2024: An ambulance was obstructed by Israeli soldiers.
25 April 2024: Three Palestinian children were reportedly killed and two injured in strikes near a medical facility.
As reported on 25 April 2024: A doctor of an UN-agency clinic was killed alongside his father, brother and either his or his brothers son by Israeli forces.
26 April 2024: The vicinity of a clinic was hit by an Israeli airstrike, killing a woman, her husband and their two babies in their residential apartment.
29 April 2024: A Red Cross field medical facility was issued an evacuation order by Israeli forces.

30 April 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access by Israeli forces to affected farmers of Israeli Settler attacks. The crew was detained for an hour and their IDs confiscated. Empty water bottles were thrown inside the ambulance.
01 May 2024: An Israeli forces quadcopter flew over a medical facility.
04 May 2024: Red Cross ambulances were fired at with tear gas canisters by Israeli forces.

04 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance team was prevented from reaching at least one Palestinian man who was shot and killed by Israeli forces whilst attempting to get out from under the rubble of his demolished home.
As reported on 06 May 2024: A medical facility was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces.
06 May 2024: An ambulance was obstructed from providing emergency services by Israeli soldiers.
06 May 2024: A medical facility was affected by Israeli evacuation orders in the area. It was evacuated the following day. The dialysis department, the only one in Gaza, reportedly remained open.
06 May 2024: Surgical staff of an INGO due to support a medical facility were denied entry at a border crossing due to its closure.
06 May 2024: An INGO was forced to close its medical unit due to being in the evacuation zone.

06 May 2024: An INGO reduced their operating hours at its static clinic in a displacement site as health workers prepared for potential evacuations. A medical unit belonging to the INGO was forced to evacuate earlier that day.

06 May 2024: In Tulkarem Refugee Camp, an INGO-supported stabilisation point was stormed during a raid by Israeli forces. Volunteer paramedics trained by the INGO were harassed and do not feel safe providing care to patients.
06 May 2024: In Tulkarm Refugee Camp, Red Cross volunteers inside a house were surrounded by Israeli forces who damaged the facades of the house.
06 May 2024: A medical facility’s entrances were surrounded by Israeli forces during a security operation on the city and neighbouring refugee camps.
06 May 2024: In Tulkarm Refugee Camp, a PRCS medical point was destroyed by Israeli explosives, rendering it out of service and destroying medical equipment.

06 May 2024: In Tulkarm Camp, ambulance crews were prevented from reaching and transporting people injured by Israeli forces during a raid on the camp. A woman injured by shrapnel was eventually handed to the Red Cross at an Israeli checkpoint.
06 May 2024: In Nur Shams Refugee Camp, ambulance crews were prevented from reaching and transporting people injured by Israeli forces during a raid on the camp.
07 May 2024: A female pharmacy student was arrested from her home by Israeli forces.

07 May 2024: An INGO discharged patients able to walk from their clinic inside a government medical facility in preparation for a potential medical evacuation. On 12 May, the INGO announced its withdrawal from the medical facility, following the advancing offensive. The remaining 22 patients were referred to other facilities.

07 May 2024: Access to a medical facility, where patients were being referred for surgery, was cut off by Israeli forces, making it difficult for ambulances to reach the facility. As a result, and following the evacuation of another nearby medical facility, the governorate does not have any substantial medical services.

07 May 2024: The entry of fuel, all medical supplies and medical evacuations of patients through a border crossing was stopped after it was closed by Israeli forces. 159 critical patients, including cancer cases, were prevented from leaving to receive treatment. As of 25 June, the number of patients prevented from leaving was about 2000.
07 May 2024: An Israeli forces quadcopter flew over a medical facility.

08 May 2024: An INGO announced it was handing over its activities at a medical facility to the Ministry of Health and relocating its staff to another medical facility to continue supporting maternity services in a safer area.
08 May 2024: Israeli forces fired shells in the vicinity of a medical facility.
08 May 2024: An INGO suspended its activities at a clinic, where over 8,200 consultations had been provided in April alone.
08 May 2024: A dental clinic was hit, killing 13 Palestinians and injuring an unspecified number.
09 May 2024: An INGO health worker was arrested from his home during an arrest campaign across West Bank by Israeli forces. He was imprisoned for at least six months.
09 May 2024: Only one mission of a UN-agency was carried out amid growing insecurity and delays during an Israeli military operation.
10 May 2024: The vicinity of a NGO medical facility was hit by a tank shell after artillery was fired in the area.
As reported on 10 May 2024: A UN-agency and its partners were forced to stop evacuations of patients from the north due to fuel shortages and limited bed capacity at health facilities in the south.
10 May 2024: Fuel at a medical facility was due to run out in 48 hours.
As reported on 10 May 2024: The roads leading to a medical facility were cut off by Israeli forces.
10 May 2024: A medical centre was hit by Israeli artillery shells, causing a fire. Two Palestinians were killed.
11 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, Israeli drones opened fire on ambulances near a UN clinic and congregated displaced people.
11 May 2024: A paediatric surgeon and a dentist were killed in an Israeli airstrike.
11 May 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli smoke bombs.
12 May 2024: In Brazil Camp, ambulances arriving at the scene were shot at by Israeli drones.
12 May 2024: A nurse was killed by an alleged Israeli drone strike.
12 May 2024: In Bureij Refugee Camp, a medical centre was hit and destroyed by Israeli airstrikes. An unspecified number of people were injured.
12 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, medical teams were fired at by Israeli tanks and armoured vehicles, preventing them from reaching killed and injured people during an Israeli military raid.
12 May 2024: Israeli artillery hit the vicinity of a health centre.
12 May 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery and fire-belts.
13 May 2024: A medical student was arrested from his home by Israeli forces.
13 May 2024: A marked UN-agency vehicle came under Israeli fire on the way to a medical facility, killing the Palestinian driver and an international staff member.
13 May 2024: An NGO medical facility was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces.
13 May 2024: Red Cross headquarters were was by Israeli shelling.

13 May 2024: 17 American health workers, including 10 from an INGO, were trapped in the Gaza Strip after providing medical services to a medical facility as part of a UN-organised mission due to a border closure. On 17 May, the health workers managed to safely get out of the Gaza Strip.
13 May 2024: The outer walls of a UN-agency health centre was damaged by Israeli bulldozers.
14 May 2024: Israeli army tanks advanced close to a NGO-supported medical facility.
14 May 2024:  A field medical facility was evacuated following the issuance of an evacuation order for the area where the medical facility was located, becoming non-functional.
15 May 2024: A nurse was killed when an Israeli airstrike hit her home.
15 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, an ambulance was hit in an Israeli airstrike, resulting in an unspecified number of casualties.

15 May 2024: A UN-agency clinic was raided by Israeli forces who forcibly evacuated displaced Palestinians and wounded. The clinic was also hit by Israeli airstrikes, leaving it non-operational. 14 were killed.

15 May 2024: Electricity generators at a medical facility stopped working after running out of fuel due to the seizure and closure of two border crossings by Israeli authorities. As a result, the facility was unable to operate any of its machines, surgery wards and emergency wards.
Around 15 May 2024: A medical centre was destroyed during an Israeli ground operation in the area.
15 May 2024: In Jabalia Camp, displaced persons were injured after being hit by Israeli snipers while leaving a UN-agency clinic.
15 May 2024: Israeli soldiers prevented paramedics from a Palestinian youth who was shot and injured by Israeli forces, causing him to bleed to death.
16 May 2024: An unspecified number of ambulances were fired upon by Israeli forces.

16 May 2024: A medical facility's windows were shattered, two of its ambulances were put out of service, and five medical facility employees were injured when a nearby residential building was hit by Israeli airstrikes. The attack also caused a power outage and interruption of internet services.
16 May 2024: A female nurse and female medical student were killed alongside three family members, including two children, by an Israeli attack.
16 June 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit by Israeli forces artillery.
16 May 2024: A laboratory technician was killed by suspected Israeli forces.
16 May 2024: Ambulances belonging to an NGO-ran medical facility were hit with an Israeli drone in a camp, injuring two health workers while transporting the wounded.

16 May 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, four displaced persons and a Red Cross-medical facility worker were killed, and an unspecified number injured, when an Israeli airstrike hit a school sheltering displaced people.
17 May 2024: Ambulances were prevented from entering the city by Israeli forces during a military operation.
17 May 2024: Ambulance crews were prevented from assisting a man who was shot and injured by Israeli soldiers.
A paramedic was shot and injured by Israeli sniper fire while attempting to assist a wounded individual.

18 May 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit when Israeli quadcopters opened fire at a residential square. 28 Palestinians, including ten women and ten children, were reportedly killed and an unspecified number injured.
18 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, an Israeli airstrike hit the vicinity of an UN-agency health clinic, injuring 13 Palestinians.
18 May 2024: Israeli airstrikes were reported in the vicinity of a INGO-supported field medical facility, injuring at least three people
As reported on, 18 May 2024: In the vicinity of a NGO medical facility, an unspecified number of Palestinians were injured by Israeli forces live fire.
19 May 2024: Ambulance and medical teams were blocked from reaching a man killed by Israeli forces. His body was later handed over to the Red Cross and transported to medical facility.
19 May 2024: A health centre was damaged by an IDF tank shell.
19 May 2024: A private nurse was killed by Israeli forces.
19 May 2024: A medical facility was damaged by Israeli airstrikes in its vicinity.

19 May 2024: An NGO medical facility was hit with shells and besieged by Israeli forces, preventing movements of medical teams and civilians. 148 medical facility staff, and 22 patients and companions were trapped inside. Areas around the medical facility were reportedly bulldozed.
20 May 2024: A male nurse was killed by Israeli forces.
20 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, medical personnel inside a besieged NGO medical facility reported snipers aiming at the building.
20 May 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
20 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, medical personnel inside a besieged NGO medical facility reported artillery shelling hitting the fifth floor, where the administration department is located.
21 May 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a female paramedic sustained shrapnel injuries from Israeli gunfire.
21 May 2024: A female nurse was severely beaten by Israeli forces at a checkpoint
21 May 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a surgical specialist was shot and killed by an Israeli sniper in a hospital carpark.

21 May 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, emergency medical teams were denied access by Israeli forces to several areas inside the camp during an operation while it took up to two hours to be granted access to other areas.
21 May 2024: A medical facility was fired at by IDF troops.
21 May 2024: A health facility was fired at by IDF tank shells.
21 May 2024:: A Red Cross ambulance was searched and crew members forced out by Israeli forces who physically inspected them, forcibly removed their bulletproof vests and took their IDs.
21 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped by Israeli forces as they opened fire at the ambulance, despite prior coordination.
21 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to evacuate a child by Israeli forces.

21 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped and searched in a camp by Israeli forces who forced the crew out of the vehicle and inspected them physically, confiscated their IDs and inspected the casualty's ID.
21 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped and searched in a camp by Israeli forces who removed the crew and patient companion from the vehicle and attacked an EMT.
21 May 2024: In Jabalia camp, the vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

21 May 2024: The entrance of the Emergency Department at a medical facility was hit by two Israeli missiles, followed by a third missile that hit a nearby building, forcing health workers to move patients to the street. Throughout the day, the medical facility was hit a further three times, resulting in damage to the intensive care unit, reception, administration and roof. Patients and health workers were evacuated. The medical facility was no longer functional.
22 May 2024: After being damaged by live ammunition, a Red Cross ambulance transporting the body of a Palestinian killed by Israeli forces was detained by Israeli forces.
22 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was delayed and the crew held at gunpoint by Israeli forces. They were forced to partially strip, had their IDs confiscated, and were physically inspected.
22 May 2024: A Red Cross crew on their way to casualties were held at gunpoint by Israeli forces who shone lasers on their bodies, denying them access to the casualties.

22 May 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility in camp was raided by Israeli forces. Almost all staff, patients, and their companions evacuated. 12 staff, including the director, 14 patients and eight companions remained. The medical facility was forced to close the next day after a four-day siege but resumed activities after IDF withdrew on 31 May.

23 May 2024: A Red Cross crew and their patient on a stretcher were attacked by Israeli forces. The crew were detained at gunpoint, and the patient arrested, before destroying the stretcher with a bulldozer.
23 May 2024: A PRCS mental health volunteer and his wife were killed after Israeli forces bombed their house.

23 May 2024: Electricity at a medical facility was largely cut off in the night due to the depletion of fuel to operate generators, putting at risk the lives of more than 1,200 wounded and sick patients, particularly in ICU, newborns in incubators, and around 600 patients requiring dialysis treatment.
24 May 2024: Inside a medical facility, a number of medical staff were surrounded by IDF.
May 2024: Delays caused by Israeli forces in allowing fuel to reach a medical facility endangered the lives of 20 newborns.
24 May 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped by Israeli forces who forced out the crew, confiscated their keys, inspected their IDs, personal phones and work phones, before forcing them to leave.
24 May 2024: A medical facility was subjected to artillery fire as Israeli vehicles advanced closer, besieging health workers and patients inside.
24 May 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery.
24 May 2024: Palestinian civilians in the vicinity of a medical facility were fired at by Israeli quadcoptors.
24 May 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery.

24 May 2024: A UN-agency reported that, due to the closure and disruption of two crossings, its health centres did not receive any medical supplies for the past 12 days, affecting medicine stocks, especially antibiotics for children and epilepsy patients. Certain laboratory and dental items and vaccines were out of stock.
25 May 2024: An ambulance was stopped and searched by Israeli forces during a raid on the village.

25 May 2024: A UN inter-agency mission to deliver fuel and ambulances to two medical facilitys was delayed at a checkpoint, where Israeli soldiers demanded physical and vehicular searches as well as biometric checks. The mission was consequently aborted.
26 May 2024: A medical facility in a camp reported a shortage of fuel and appealed to international bodies to intervene.
26 May 2024: In Jenin Refugee Camp, a PRCS emergency station was raided by Israeli forces.
26 May 2024: Ambulance crews were prevented by Israeli soldiers from reaching a boy who was shot by the soldiers. The boy died from his injuries.

26 May 2024: In an unnamed displacement site, the vicinity of a UN agency Log-Base was hit by Israeli airstrikes, killing 45 Palestinians, including a male laboratory technician and female doctor, and injuring 249 others.
26 May 2024: A besieged medical facility was unable to transfer or treat patients due to lack of medical equipment.
26 May 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

26 May 2024: Following an Israeli airstrike on a displacement camp at a UN-agency site, health workers were unable to transport casualties and injured civilians due to the lack of a medical facilitys in the area.
As reported on 27 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, Israeli forces repurposed a dialysis medical facility into a military base and operational centre.

27 May 2024: The entrance of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit by Israeli drone strikes, killing two administrative staff members and injuring another. As a result, the medical facility was forced to cease all operations.
27 May 2024: The vicinity of an INGO-supported field medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery.
27 May 2024: Health workers and patients at an INGO-supported stabilisation point were forced to flee due to intensified hostilities. All medical activities ceased at the facility.
28 May 2024: An internal medicine and rheumatology consultant was arrested at his home by Israel forces.
28 May 2024: In Bureij Camp, a Red Cross medical facility staff member was killed when an Israeli bomb hit his house.
28 May 2024: The main electricity generator at a medical facility was completely destroyed by an Israeli strike.
28 May 2024: Near a health facility, IDF opened fire at targets.
28 May 2024: A health facility was damaged by an IDF shells.
28 May 2024: A male nurse was arrested from his home by Israeli forces following a siege.
28 May 2024: A doctor and at least five Palestinians, including a child, were shot and killed and an unspecified number injured by Israeli forces near a medical facility.
28 May 2024: A clinicl was bombed by Israeli artillery shelling. Health workers and patients were trapped inside.
28 May 2024: The upper floor of a field medical facility was bombed by Israeli artillery shelling. Health workers and patients were trapped inside.
28 May 2024: An ambulance evacuating wounded Palestinians was fired at by Israeli tanks.
28 May 2024: Red Cross teams were forced to evacuate their field medical facility due to growing insecurity, including artillery and air bombardments, and evacuation of residents by Israeli forces.
28 May 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was subjected to clashes.
28 May 2024: A health facility was hit by IDF shells.

29 May 2024: PRCS ambulance crews were fired at by Israeli troops as they tried to extinguish a fire caused by an Israeli airstrike on one of the three ambulances in their crew, forcing them to withdraw.
29 May 2024: A male anaesthesia and resuscitation technician was arrested from an ambulance by Israeli forces at a checkpoint.
29 May 2024: Two PRCS paramedics were killed in an Israeli airstrike which hit their ambulance while heading to evacuate wounded Palestinians.
29 May 2024: A Palestinian man was injured in the vicinity of an INGO-supported medical facility in an Israeli attack.
As reported on 29 May 2024: A WHO mission was unable to visit a medical facility due to delays at a checkpoint.
May 2024: In Al Maghazi Refugee Camp, a UN-agency clinic was hit by Israeli artillery.
30 May 2024: An INGO primary care centre was forced to close due to Israeli military operations in the area.
30 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

30 May 2024: An ambulance transporting a patient and her family was stopped by Israeli forces at a checkpoint for over 30 minutes. The husband was arrested. Israeli forces also detained the ambulance crew, seized their ID cards and phones and prevented them from communicating with anyone.
30 May 2024: A medical facility was forced to close after its staff and patients evacuated due to being in the Israeli-ordered evacuation zone.
As reported on 31 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the fifth floor of an NGO medical facility was completely destroyed.
As reported on 31 May 2024: A Malnutrition Stabilisation Centre completely ceased operations, with efforts to relocate its services to another location.
As reported on 31 May 2024: A medical facility was repurposed into an Israeli military base and command centre. It partially resumed on 01 June.
31 May 2024: A PRCS employee was killed by Israeli bombardment on his home.
31 May 2024: A medical facility and its medical equipment was severely damaged when two floors of the medical facility were burnt upon Israeli withdrawal. It resumed partial functionality on 01 June.
As reported on 31 May 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the wreckage of a PRCS ambulance was discovered following the withdrawal of Israeli forces from the camp.
As reported on 31 May 2024: A Red Cross psychologist and her daughter were killed by Israeli forces.
31 May 2024: A paramedic was shot and injured during armed clashed between the IDF and civilians.
02 June 2024: The last operational field medical facility in the city was ordered to evacuate by Israeli forces.
02 June 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
02 June 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, the wreckage of a second PRCS ambulance was found following the withdrawal of Israeli forces.
02 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied movement and turned around by Israeli forces at a checkpoint on the way back from transporting a patient.
Around 02 June 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a male nurse was killed in an Israeli attack.
As reported on 03 June 2024: A medical facility was impacted by shelling by suspected Israeli forces.
03 June 2024: Two ambulance and medical crews were obstructed and prevented by Israeli forces from carrying out their work during a raid on the area
03 June 2024: The driver and crew of an ambulance were detained for over half an hour by Israeli forces at a checkpoint.
03 June 2024: In Balata Refugee Camp, a Red Cross ambulance was was stopped by Israeli forces who arrested the patient.
03 June 2024: An ambulance was damaged when Israeli settlers threw stones at it while it was travelling.
03 June 2024: While Red Cross were attending a patient, Israeli forces got into their ambulance and moved it from its location.
03 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance at a checkpoint was denied access to a patient by Israeli forces who shone lasers at the crew.
03 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a patient by Israeli forces.
04 June 2024: An INGO field medical facility was completely evacuated and its equipment moved to a secondary location, leaving no operational medical facility or basic medical facility in the city.
04 June 2024: Israeli quadcopters dropped bombs at the gates of a medical facility.
04 June 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, the vicinity of an NGO medical facility was hit by Israeli drones.
04 June 2024: A male nurse was killed by Israeli forces.
As reported on 04 June 2024: A medical facility was rendered out of service following Israeli forces withdrawal. Generators were burned and roads leading to the facility were destroyed.

05 June 2024: A medical facility ran on one generator to produce electricity, with another one out of service, putting the lives of patients in intensive care units and premature babies on ventilators, at risk. On 08 June, the medical facility's director warned that if the generator should breakdown, in addition to the shortages of fuel and medicines, the medical facility would cease operations.
05 June 2024: A Red Cross crew was denied access by Israeli forces to a patient they were attempting to transport from a besieged house. The patient was then temporarily detained.
05 June 2024: A male nurse was killed by Israeli forces.

As reported on 05 June 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a Red Cross medical point, within a UN-agency health centre, was burnt by Israeli forces during a military offensive in the area, destroying medical supplies inside.
06 June 2024: A Red Cross emergency medical team came under Israeli fire while providing medical care to two patients. As a result, the patients died.
06 June 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli warplanes, killing one person in a nearby house.
Between 01-13 June 2024: A humanitarian mission delivering critical medical supplies to medical facilitys and transferring a patient faced a delay of over five hours at a checkpoint.
06 June 2024: In al Maghazi Refugee Camp, a UN health clinic was hit by an Israeli airstrike, killing and injuring an unspecified number of people.
07 June 2024: An NGO-supported medical facility caught fire during Israeli forces shelling.
As reported on 07 June 2024: The director of a health organisation was killed, alongside several relatives, when an Israeli airstrike hit their home.
08 June 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, a doctor and his family were shot and killed by Israeli forces who broke into their home.
08 June 2024: A medical facility received bomb threats from Israeli forces following airstrikes in the vicinity, causing panic amongst displaced people sheltering inside.
08 June 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
08 June 2024: Two Red Cross ambulance crews were trapped while responding to events in a camp when Israeli vehicles surrounded the area. One ambulance was damaged by shrapnel.
08 June 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, a male nurse was killed when Israeli forces bombed the camp.
09 June 2024: Two Red Cross ambulances were obstructed and detained by Israeli forces while transporting injured people. The crew and patients were inspected.
09 June 2024: Ambulances were prevented by Israeli drones and airstrikes from reaching Palestinian casualties following an attack on the area.

09 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was detained and turned off at a checkpoint despite carrying a critical patient, interfering with medical equipment. The ambulance was then sent back to a previous checkpoint to be inspected and the patient photographed.
09 June 2024: The vicinity of an NGO medical facility was hit by Hamas fired mortar rounds targeting Israeli forces.
09 June 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, a pharmacist was killed in is home by Israeli airstrikes.
10 June 2024: The tyres of a Red Crross ambulance were punctured by Israeli forces’ live ammunition as it attempted to reach injured Palestinians.
10 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was shot at by Israeli forces and obstructed from evacuating a boy injured in a military operation.
10 June 2024: Red Cross medics were denied access by Israeli forces for at least two hours to evacuate injured Palestinians.

10 June 2024: A Red Cross health worker was beaten by Israeli forces while performing first aid. Soldiers also inspected him, confiscated his first aid kit and protective gear, and tore the emblem from his clothes.
10 June 2024: A Red Cross crew was held at gunpoint and fired at with preemptive bullets by Israeli forces shining laser lights on them. As a result, the casualties they were trying to reach died.
10 June 2024: A Red Cross health worker was obstructed from reaching casualties of an Israeli raid when they blocked the roads.
10 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was fired at with preemptive bullets by Israeli forces, denying them access to a casualty.
10 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance team was obstructed from reaching casualties of an Israeli raid when they blocked the roads.

10 June 2024: A medical facility's public relations officer, and secretary for a medical INGO, was killed with his parents and sister when the home they were displaced to was hit by Israeli airstrikes.

11 June 2024: Red Cross medical aid was obstructed by Israeli forces from reaching a shot Palestinian, causing him to bleed to death. While transporting his body, the ambulance was stopped and inspected.
11 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was fired at by Israeli forces while attending to a patient, killing him. The ambulance was detained and searched after moving the patients body.
11 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance transporting six casualties, including a 17-year-old boy, was obstructed and shot at during a military raid by Israeli forces.
12 June 2024: A nurse was killed when his home was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
13 June 2024: A female medical student was killed in a 'humanitarian services' area by Israeli airstrikes.
13 June 2024: A Palestinian Red Cross paramedic was physically assaulted and injured by Israeli forces.
13 June 2024: At least one ambulance was prevented from entering the town during a military raid by Israeli forces.
13 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was prevented from evacuating an injured Palestinian during a military raid at the neighbouring refugee camp by Israeli forces.

13 June 2024: The work of medical and administrative teams at a medical facility was hindered due to Israeli blockades on the streets leading to the medical facility. Dialysis patients and ambulances were prevented from reaching the facility.
14 June 2024: A nurse was killed by suspected Israeli forces.
14 June 2024: A UN-agency school near a field medical facility was hit by Israeli artillery.
14 June 2024: In the vicinity of a medical facility, tear gas canisters were fired by Israeli forces at Palestinians.
16 June 2024: An ambulance was damaged after Israeli forces opened fire whilst they were attempting to provide medical care to Palestinian casualties.
17 June 2024: An ambulance was vandalised by Israeli settlers.
17 June 2024: A medical facility faced a shortage of medical supplies.
19 June 2024: The vicinity of an NGO-supported medical facility was hit by Israeli forces artillery.
20 June 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
20 June 2024: The vicinity of a medical facility was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
20 June 2024: An ambulance was obstructed from transporting a patient to medical facility by Israeli forces with firearms.
21 June 2024: A pharmacist, her husband and two children were killed in their home by Israeli airstrikes.

21 June 2024: A Red Cross office, also being used as a makeshift IDP camp, was damaged by nearby suspected Israeli forces shelling. The walls were damaged, 24 people were killed and 49 injured, including two children of Red Cross staffers.
21 June 2024: In Qaddoura Refugee Camp, a Red Cross crew was prevented from reaching a Palestinian man who had been shot and injured during a military raid by Israeli forces.
As reported on 21 June 2024: An INGO was unable to bring in supplies and was forced to temporarily suspend operations at one of its health centres.
As reported on 21 June 2024: An INGO reduced the frequency of dressing changes for patients with severe burns at a medical facility it supports.
As reported on 21 June 2024: An INGO reduced the frequency of dressing changes for patients with severe burns at a medical facility it supports.

22 June 2024: A Red Cross crew were prevented from providing medical care to an injured civilian by Israeli forces who had placed the person on the front of a military jeep. The crew were eventually allowed to transport him to medical facility.

23 June 2024: The main generator of a field medical facility stopped functioning due to lack of fuel. The facility, which received more than 1,500 patients per day, relied on a secondary generator to maintain its operations.
23 June 2024: Two health workers were killed, including the director of emergency and ambulance services, when a clinic was hit by an Israeli airstrike.
23 June 2024: A nurse was killed alongside his wife, children and brother in their home by Israeli forces bombing.
As reported on 24 June 2024: In Jabalia Refugee Camp, a UNRWA health centre was set on fire and put out of service by Israeli forces during a military offensive inside the camp.
25 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was denied access to a camp by Israeli forces, despite coordination with Red Cross.
25 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was denied access to a patient by Israeli forces.
25 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance was stopped and turned off by Israeli forces. The crew were temporarily detained and their keys and phones confiscated.
25 June 2024: A Red Cross ambulance in a camp was stopped by Israeli forces who temporarily detained the crew, despite coordination with Red Cross.
25 June 2024: An INGO physiotherapist was killed by Israeli forces while cycling near to the INGO clinic where he worked.
25 June 2024: The vicinity of a clinic was hit by Israeli airstrikes.
25 June 2024: A medical facility reported a shortage of fuel and medical supplies, and called on international bodies to provide them with solar.
26 June 2024: In Rafah Refugee Camp, an INGO health centre was completely destroyed, likely by Israeli forces.
26 June 2024: A medical facility was raided by Israeli forces and Israeli snipers were stationed on nearby buildings.
27 June 2024: PRCS warned of a decline in ambulance and emergency services as 36% of its ambulances were out of service due to fuel shortages caused by Israeli restrictions.
27 June 2024: A private medical facility was stormed by Israeli forces who arrested nine people, including a health worker. They were all released after five hours.

28 June 2024: In Nuseirat Refugee Camp, a civil defence station was hit by Israeli airstrikes and artillery, damaging at least one vehicle and other equipment. At least three civil defence personnel were killed.
29 June 2024: The PRCS's temporary administrative headquarters was hit by shrapnel from Israeli shelling. Consequently, the building was fully evacuated.
29 June 2024: Ambulances were fired at by Israeli tanks as they attempted to reach wounded people during an Israeli raid on the area.
29 June 2024: Ambulances were fired at by Israeli tanks as they attempted to reach wounded people during an Israeli raid on the area.
29 June 2024: An NGO-ran medical facility suffered from a shortage of fuel and was under threat of complete cessation of services.
30 June 2024: Near a medical facility, the IDF opened fire.
